article_title: Voice of The Southern: Rubio Republicans’ best option to convey intelligent anger

og.description: As Republicans, we’re angry. We’re angry with Barack Obama and those who elected him — twice. We’re frequently almost as angry with former House Speaker John Boehner for quietly acquiescing
